My work experience

A small selection of recent projects

Clothes online store

Svelte, Node.js, MySQL

Designed a user-friendly interface for seamless browsing and quick product access, showcasing clothing with clear images and concise descriptions to aid informed decisions. Implemented a hassle-free cart system, COD payment, and a comprehensive admin dashboard for efficient store management. Features included content control, inventory tracking, product updates, and analytics to monitor sales, customer behavior, and website traffic.

Github

Svelte, Node.js, MySQL

A blockchain-based NFT game where players can buy, sell, and trade car NFTs using cryptocurrency.

Github

A decentralized application that allows users to mint NFTs using the Avalanche blockchain.

A decentralized application that allows users to stake tokens and earn rewards on the Polygon blockchain.
